name: Super Happy Funland
description:
They say Princess Vivienne, ruler of Super Happy Funland, was gifted at birth with incredible healing magic. As a child, she would would summon magical groups of bunnies to play with, and her laugh alone was able to heal those who were ill! She pushed back the corruption of the forest around her kingdom, and after hearing many such tales, you now seek her help.

Made in 72hrs for the MoonMoon game jam.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow KeysMovementLCTRL/RCTRLShoot
ESCPauseU/I/OCheats to teleport to levels 1, 2, and 3 respectively. (Use if bad)
